description:
Anyone can tell you how to start a crowdfunding campaign, but not many people can show you. I'm going to do both. The biggest asset you receive from this course is the fact that I have personally built and launched my own extremely successful crowdfunding campaign and I'm not just giving you information you can probably find through a search engine.

You will see how everything looks and works on the backend of kickstarter in various screen recorded tutorials, all while I explain how to properly use and function all of its resources.

I will teach you how I did it from A to Z, while overcoming hurdles and obstacles along the way. I will share with you my personal experience of creating a Kickstarter campaign, how my project was featured on some of the biggest news sources in the world (Mashable, Buzzfeed, New York Times, Huffington Post, Cosmopolitan, Refinery29, etc.), and how I did it with absolutely no crowdfunding experience, no photography or videography knowledge/experience, and no budget all in just 30 DAYS.

Before your project, during your project, and after your project.. I will teach you EVERYTHING you need to know about launching a successful project. I am so confident that my course will help you launch a successful campaign, that I will offer a 30-day money back guarantee if that isn't the case. This is a course you do not want to miss out on.
title: The Ultimate Kickstarter Guide: How my project raised 784% !
